meta.title: SigmaTrade | Trading Bots Family Monitoring
meta.description: SigmaTrade - professional monitoring of trading bots family. Track exchange bots, arbitrage, and MEV activity in real-time on Binance Smart Chain.
meta.keywords: sigma trade, trading bot, arbitrage, cryptocurrency exchange, MEV, blockchain, monitoring, transactions, BSC, BNB, BEP-20, Binance Smart Chain, real-time
meta.og_description: Monitoring the Sigma Trade trading bots family. Exchange bots, arbitrage, and MEV activity. Real-time tracking of transactions and balances on BSC.

hero.title: While others talk, we work
hero.subtitle: Automatic cryptocurrency exchange 24/7 on Binance Smart Chain

exchange_bot.name: Exchange Bot
exchange_bot.description: Automatic cryptocurrency exchange with optimal rates 24/7

mev_bot.name: MEV Bot
mev_bot.description: Maximal extractable value through mempool monitoring

arb_bot.name: Arbitrage Bot
arb_bot.description: Cross-exchange arbitrage and price anomaly detection

exchange_bot.warning_text: Any attempts to deposit funds to the smart contract without prior interview will result in irreversible loss of funds! Money deposited this way will NOT be returned to the user under any circumstances. To participate in the bot's operation, you must pass an interview and receive official access.
exchange_bot.auto_exchange_desc: The exchange bot conducts cryptocurrency exchanges 24/7 on Binance Smart Chain. Each exchange operation is performed automatically at the optimal rate in real-time.
exchange_bot.fee_desc: A fee of 0.1% to 0.8% is charged on each exchange. The fee size depends on the exchange volume, market conditions, and network congestion.
exchange_bot.profit_desc: The fee is divided among participants whose funds are in the bot's circulation. Income is proportional to your contribution to the system's total working capital.
exchange_bot.map_usage_drag: Drag: Press and move nodes to change layout
exchange_bot.map_usage_zoom: Zoom: Use +/− buttons or mouse wheel
exchange_bot.map_usage_hover: Hover: Hover over a node to view details and highlight connections
exchange_bot.map_usage_color: Color coding: Red nodes — danger warnings, green — correct path
exchange_bot.map_usage_mobile: Mobile: Use pinch gestures for convenient navigation
exchange_bot.how_to_start: How to Start Working with the Exchange Bot
exchange_bot.step1_desc: Email trdgood00@gmail.com with a participation request. After reviewing your application, we'll schedule an online interview to discuss cooperation terms.
exchange_bot.step2_desc: After successfully passing the interview, you receive official access to the system and can safely deposit funds to participate in the bot's circulation.
exchange_bot.step3_desc: Your funds start working in the bot's circulation. From each exchange, you receive a share of the fee proportional to your contribution. Income is credited automatically.
exchange_bot.commission_range: From 0.1% to 0.8% of each exchange amount. The specific percentage depends on the operation volume and current market conditions.
exchange_bot.distribution_desc: The fee is divided among all participants whose funds are in the bot's circulation. The larger your contribution to the total working capital, the larger share of each fee you receive.
exchange_bot.example_desc: For an exchange of $10,000 with a 0.5% fee, the total fee is $50. If your share in circulation is 10%, you receive $5 from this operation. With hundreds of exchanges daily, income becomes significant.

arbitrage.title: Arbitrage Bot
arbitrage.subtitle: Cross-exchange cryptocurrency arbitrage
arbitrage.automation_desc: 24/7 search and execution of arbitrage trades
arbitrage.analytics_desc: Spread analysis and optimal route finding

partner.title: Partner Program
partner.subtitle: Earn on 3 levels of partner network
partner.level_depth_desc: Receive rewards not only from direct partners, but also from second and third level partners. Your partner network brings income at three depth levels.
partner.income_from_desc: Earn a percentage from partners' income and their deposits in trading operations. Double reward source at each level.
partner.growing_percent_desc: Unique progressive system: start with 3% on the first level, receive 2% on the second and 5% on the third level.
partner.level1_desc: You receive 3% from the income and deposits of each partner you invited directly. These are your direct first-level referrals. The more actively they trade, the more you earn.
partner.level2_desc: When your partners invite their partners, you receive 2% from their income and deposits. This is the second level of your partner network. Your network grows and brings stable income.
partner.level3_desc: The third level has the maximum rate of 5% from income and deposits. These are partners invited by second-level partners. The deeper your network, the greater the potential income!
partner.example1: Example 1: Your 1st level partner earned $1000 and deposited $500 in trading. You receive: 3% of $1500 = $45
partner.example2: Example 2: A 2nd level partner (your partner's partner) earned $800 and deposited $300. You receive: 2% of $1100 = $22
partner.example3: Example 3: A 3rd level partner earned $600 and deposited $400. You receive: 5% of $1000 = $50

cooperation.title: How to Start Cooperation
cooperation.subtitle: Path from application to working with trading systems
cooperation.first_contact_desc: Email us at trdgood00@gmail.com. Tell us about yourself, your experience and goals. We'll respond within 24-48 hours.
cooperation.video_interview_desc: After reviewing the application, an online interview is conducted where we discuss cooperation terms and assess mutual compatibility.
cooperation.recommendations_desc: Recommendations from active participants significantly increase approval chances and positively affect cooperation terms.
cooperation.access_desc: You gain access to professional trading systems: MEV bots, arbitrage bots, and trading bots. Start earning immediately after receiving access.
cooperation.team_desc: You're assigned to an active team where you receive support, training, and access to collective resources. Work in a team of professionals.
cooperation.own_team_desc: Gain the opportunity to establish your own team and invite partners. Earn on three partner network levels (3% → 2% → 5%).
cooperation.notice_text: SigmaTrade reserves the right to refuse cooperation without explanation to any user. This is necessary to maintain a high level of security and quality in our closed ecosystem. We value every application but accept only those who meet our standards.

mindmap.title: Interactive Site Map
mindmap.subtitle: Visualization of the entire SigmaTrade platform interaction concept
mindmap.usage_drag: Drag: Press and move nodes to change layout
mindmap.usage_zoom: Zoom: Use +/− buttons or mouse wheel
mindmap.usage_click: Click on node: Click a node to navigate to the corresponding page
mindmap.usage_hover: Hover: Hover over a node to highlight connections

footer.message: We don't do aggressive marketing, but we're open to cooperation. New user admission is possible exclusively by recommendation from those already working with us. This is a closed club, friends.

login.warning_text: Unfortunately, you're attempting to log in from an unverified device. If you need to log in from a non-verified device, enter your master password and specify the hash of your last payout to your wallet in our system.
login.master_password_hint: Required for login from new or unverified device
login.transaction_hash_hint: Enter the hash of your last payout to your wallet in our system
login.security_notice_text: All data is transmitted over a secure connection. We don't store your passwords in plain text and use modern encryption methods. Your device information is used exclusively for verification and account security.
